document_title: Obesity level 1: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: beo-phi-do-1.json_7_What diseases can level 1 obesity cause?
subsection_content:
Grade 1 obesity is the cause of more than 200 different diseases, including dangerous diseases such as arthritis, rheumatism, blood fat, fatty liver, atherosclerosis, cerebral vascular obstruction and even stroke. Not only that, grade 1 obesity is a risk factor for many cancers, especially gastrointestinal cancer...
Grade 1 obesity is not easy to recognize with the naked eye. So to get accurate results, patients need to go to a reputable hospital to conduct examination and treatment as soon as possible when detecting symptoms of grade 1 obesity.
